title: Srila Prabhupada Mayapur, Oct 06, 1974
image_desc: A photo of a clear blue sky with fluffy white clouds.
content: - "Home sweet home," Yes very sweet. The whole day and night work. This is moh. He is working hard day and night. Their is not a single moment leisure and still, he's: "Sweet home". This is illusion.
narration: "Home sweet home," Yes very sweet. The whole day and night work. This is moh. He is working hard day and night. Their is not a single moment leisure and still, he's: "Sweet home". This is illusion.
